name: Jumpman 8: Jumpman in space
description:
You are a spaceship but a black hole is right behind you so you can't fly freely.
Jump your way to the top and shoot the bad guys to get the highest score at the end

Music by TeknoAxe (https://teknoaxe.com/Home.php), Graphic assets by Kenney (https://kenney.nl/) and sound design made on SFXR

This was made during the 2020 Mix And Game Jam
The theme was "Mixing Genres" so I mixed the Platformer (Doodle Jump) and the Shoot 'em Up (Space Invaders) to make a Platformer Shoot 'em up
